蠟扦.definition: candlestick with a spike, onto which candles are impaled

蠟染.definition: batik (color printing on cloth using wax)

蠟梅.definition: variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]

蠟樣芽孢桿菌.pinyin: là yàng yá bāo gǎn jūn

蠟燭不點不亮.pinyin: là zhú bù diǎn bù liàng
蠟燭不點不亮.definition: some people have to be pushed for them to take action

蠟燭兩頭燒.definition: to burn the candle at both ends (idiom); to labor under a double burden

蠟療.definition: wax therapy (used to treat arthritis etc)

蠟筆小新.definition: Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
